item.title: Reminder that every single one of them is vaccinated to the max
item.description:
https://bsky.app/profile/maggieastor.bsky.social/post/3m7ati7jrqc23
I grew up watching polio being eradicated from my home country in real time. And now I’m going to witness a revival of several preventable diseases, because of these radical anti vaxxers. None of this affects them personally, they all have the best medical care you can get. I don’t usually get to this level of anger, my mouth tastes like metal. Fuck everything about this.

item.description: A federal judge in Florida on Friday ordered the release of grand jury transcripts from the federal sex trafficking cases of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. U.S. District Judge Rodney Smith said a recently-passed federal law ordering the release of records related to the cases overrode a federal rule prohibiting the release of matters before a grand jury.

item.title: Obscur Maelle Cosplay Progress: Collar and Wing
item.description: The collar and wing are made from 5mm EVA foam, while the collar has 1mm and 2mm accents, all sealed with Plastidip (my new love). It took me about 20 hours (!!) to make this - but that’s because a lot of time was spent drafting a pattern and making test cuts with angles and folds. Bevel cutter was the MVP. Painting did genuinely take about 10 hours though, I tried my best to match the marbling seen in the game. The collar closes with magnets at the back. Angelus paint pens came to my rescue for this project, and Jacquard’s Lumiere Old Brass is the primary accent color you see here . I also utilized white/gray/black Folkart paints. There are more WIP pictures in the story highlights of my Instagram, where I also will be posting a making-of reel soon.
item.dc:creator: LittleLuckyCosplay

item.title: Let's send food to people in need
item.description:
We are excited to be back for TheFreePizzaDude today! If you'd like to help a struggling Imgurian get groceries or a meal today there are 2 easy ways -
You can find a request for food in the comments, reply to them and then send a DM to get an order set up Or you can contribute to the Imgurian Meal Fund and we'll send the food for you!
Anonymous Angels have been such an amazing help for us to feed more people, we love you so much! https://www.paypal.me/TheFreePizzaDude https://ko-fi.com/thefreepizzadude
And here's how you'd send it yourself! Any questions as an Angel? Just shoot us a message! We'll be on this username until 8pm central
PJ is here to show you how it works for requests -
It's much easier for us to help requests in the US but we'll do our best to pick up requests from any country. Putting your country in your comment helps us match you to an Angel in your area
Any questions as a requestor? Just leave a comment! We'll have helpers on the post for 6 hours
6 more hours to help as many people as we can Let's get it going! ... Today's Meal Tally 205 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th, 10th and 11th by Pizza Angel @IMPICKLERICK 240 12th, 13th, 14th and 15th by @OP 340 16th, 17th, 18th and 19th by @OP 20th by Pizza Angel @jaenen 21st, 22nd, Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant by @OP 25th and 26th by Pizza Angel @IMPICKLERICK 27th by Pizza Angel @WafflesOfMassDeliciousness 28th, 29th, 30th, 31st, 32nd and 33rd by Pizza Angel @KeithaBandit 34th by Pizza Angel @sneakinglurkingpeepingguy 35th by Pizza Angel @maddoxonelung 36th and 37th by Pizza Angel @IrvingSchwinglepuck 38th, 39th, 40th, 41st and The Meaning of Life, the Universe, and Everything by Pizza Angel @keithabandit 43rd, 44th, 45th and 46th by @OP 47th by Pizza Angel @Jaenen ... Today's Grocery Tally 1st by Grocery Angel @keithabandit 2nd by Grocery Angel @keithabandit 3rd by Grocery Angel @WafflesOfMassDeliciousness 4th by Grocery Angel @MagicaGaming 5th by Grocery Angel @KeithaBandit
item.dc:creator: TheFreePizzaDude

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1548ish (Hermit I'd Like to...)
item.description:
Fuck if I know what my count is and I cant be arsed to look. Let's get this bread.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: "fuck you" (kissy noises) ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin 6) there's a discord now: https://discord.gg/cEGtpDN8

item.title: I got a false smile!
item.description:
Before....I know, yuck. I brushed most of my life. They were just rotting away. Both of my parents had dentures before their 40's. I lasted halfway to 45.
New grill! Excuse the Elvis lip. The numbing agent was still in full effect. Merry Christmoose to me!
Nugget tax! He's just loafing about.
